location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reports the arrival at Bushire of two country ships: the Elizafrom Calcutta [Kolkata], and the Khosrowiefrom Musulipatam [Machilipatnam]. William Bruce goes on to state that he has received from the Broker at Muscat news that Rahma ben Jauber [Rahma bin Jabir] has visited Muscat, where he has entered into engagements with the Imam [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd]. Bruce speculates on Rahma ben Jauber's intentions, based on information received from the Broker.
